assert.sql: SELECT Row,order_id,user_id FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY user_id) AS Row, order_id,user_id FROM t_order) AS t WHERE Row >= 2 AND Row <= 3
assert.expected-sql: SELECT Row,order_id,user_id FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY user_id) AS Row, order_id,user_id FROM t_order_0) AS t
